text:
Memorandum from
JAMES ROBERTSON
Harold:
I'm awfully sorry this got
buried and just came to light. The
memo is self-explanatory.
We can’t always do this* and
frankly none of us recalls any such
agreement - but since I've discovered
enough money in one account, we’ll do
it this time, hoping that maybe we will
get a reward in Heaven.
Okay?
How goes the convention plans?
God bless you!
